detail_desc: Trousers in soft viscose jersey with an elasticated waist, side pockets and wide, tapered legs with elasticated hems.
Cropped top in stretch cotton jersey in a narrow cut at the top with short, narrow shoulder straps and a racer back.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a round neckline and a print motif.
Off-the-shoulder jumper in a soft knit with long sleeves and wide ribbing at the top, cuffs and hem.
Fully lined, hole-patterned bikini top with an elasticated hem.
Tube scarf in a soft knit. Width 24 cm, circumference 46 cm.
Tops in soft cotton jersey with a racer back and visible elastication at the hem.
Long, fitted vest top in stretch cotton jersey.

Short-sleeved shirt in a cotton weave with a button-down collar and classic front. Yoke with a pleat at the back, a chest pocket, and a rounded hem. Regular Fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently tapered waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.

Fully lined bikini top with removable inserts that shape the bust and provide good support. Narrow cut with cut-out sections at the sides, a mesh racer back with a zip that has a long tab, and covered elastication at the hem.

Jumper in a soft, fine knit containing some wool with an opening and woven ties at the back of the neck, gathers in the sides for a good fit over the tummy and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Swim shorts in a patterned weave with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and a back pocket with a hook and loop fastening. Mesh inner shorts.
Long-sleeved top in a soft cotton blend with gathers in the sides for best fit.

Slim-fit jeans in soft superstretch denim with worn details and embroidery. Adjustable elasticated waist (in sizes 8-12Y), zip fly and press-stud, fake front pockets, real back pockets and narrow, raw-edge hems.

Set with a long-sleeved top and shoulder bag in soft cotton jersey. Top with a reversible sequin motif on the front (sizes 1½-3Y with normal sequins). Slightly longer and rounded at the back. Bag with a sequined motif on the front, a hook and loop fastening at the top and a narrow shoulder strap with a hook and loop fastening at one end. Lined. Size of bag approx. 11.5x13 cm.
Short jumper knitted in a soft alpaca blend with long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Short dress in woven fabric with a V-neck and wrapover front with a visible button at one side and concealed ties at the other. Long sleeves and wide, buttoned cuffs. Lined at the top.

Dress in patterned chiffon with decorative gathers at the neckline, an opening and button at the back of the neck and butterfly sleeves. Elasticated seam at the waist and a skirt that has an extra layer at the front and is longer at the back. Jersey lining.
Ankle boots in leather with square toes, elastic gores in the sides and covered heels. Linings in an organic cotton weave and insoles in leather. Heel 5 cm.
Cropped, boxy-style T-shirt in pima cotton jersey. Round, rib-trimmed neckline, dropped shoulders and short slits in the sides.
Straight-cut jacket in woven fabric with notch lapels, buttons at the front and welt front pockets with a flap. Decorative buttons at the cuffs. Lined.
Fine-knit cardigan in a relaxed fit with low dropped shoulders and wide, 3/4-length sleeves with lace embroidery. No buttons.
Calf-length dress in a viscose weave with an opening and button at the back of the neck. Short, wide sleeves that finish at the elbows, and a smocked seam at the waist.
Flat cap in a cotton weave. Lined.
Wide polo-neck jumper knitted in bouclé yarn with a wide collar, long sleeves with thumbholes at the cuffs and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Long-sleeved top in soft, marled sweatshirt fabric with a print motif, press-studs at the neck and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Lace bikini briefs with a low waist, lined gusset, narrow sides and medium coverage at the back.
Short jumper in a soft, rib-knit cotton blend with long raglan sleeves, a frill trim around the neckline and cuffs, and a ribbed hem.
Trousers in a viscose weave with an elasticated drawstring waist in a relaxed fit. Pockets in the side seams, a slightly lower crotch, and tapered legs with elasticated hems.
Wide sports top in fast-drying functional fabric with a print motif on the front and short cap sleeves.
Cotton jersey briefs in various designs with an elasticated waist and lined gusset.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a low waist and decorative rings at the sides.

Playsuit in a soft viscose and Tencel™ lyocell weave with a V-neck, concealed fastening at the front and short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups. Flap chest pockets with a press-stud, an elasticated seam at the waist, side pockets, welt back pockets and short legs with sewn-in turn-ups.
Off-the-shoulder jumper in a soft, fine knit with a double-layer edge at the top, long raglan sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Cardigan in soft, fine-knit cotton with sequined embroidery and buttons down the front. Ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Cardigan in a soft, fine knit with slits in the sides and no buttons.

Calf-length dress in a gently crêped weave with spaghetti shoulder straps, a V-neck and a wrapover front with a concealed fastening and ties at one side. Seam at the waist and a skirt with an asymmetric, flounced hem.
Dress in crisp tulle with an embroidered yoke, small opening and button at the back of the neck and short sleeves. Lined.
Blouse in a soft weave with a narrow collar, concealed buttons down the front, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs and a rounded hem.
Short, fitted top in ribbed jersey with a turtle neck and long sleeves.
Shaftless socks in a soft, fine-knit cotton blend.
Sleeveless romper suit in soft, patterned cotton jersey with elastication at the top both front and back.
Set with a top and trousers in soft organic cotton jersey. Top with lapped shoulders and long sleeves. Trousers with an elasticated drawstring waist and ribbed hems.
Short dress in a patterned viscose weave with a V-neck, cap sleeves and a wrapover front that fastens with a concealed press-stud and ties at the waist. Unlined.
T-shirt in soft, patterned slub cotton jersey with a press-stud on one shoulder.
CONSCIOUS Joggers in organic cotton sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist and ribbed hems.
T-shirts in soft organic cotton jersey with a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Tights in a fine knit containing glittery threads. Elasticated waist and soft inside.
Fine-knit socks in a soft cotton blend with a fold-down shaft. Soft terry inside. Sizes 3-9 with anti-slip protectors.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a high waist and cutaway coverage at the back.
Shirt in a soft viscose weave with a chest pocket, buttons down the front and a yoke at the back. Long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a tie detail at the hem.
5-pocket, high-waisted trousers in washed stretch twill with a zip fly and button, and slim legs.
Lightly padded sleep bag in soft, patterned jersey with a jersey lining. The sleep bag is designed for indoor use only.
Bodysuit in soft cotton jersey with a print motif. Lapped shoulders, decorative scalloped trims at the top, long puff sleeves and press-studs at the crotch.
Jumper in a cable-knit viscose blend with a V-neck, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Calf-length dress in a softly draping viscose weave with a grandad collar and covered buttons down the front. Long raglan sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a detachable tie belt at the waist.
Lace thong briefs with a low waist, lined gusset, narrow sides and string back.

Set with a long-sleeved top and pair of trousers in lightweight sweatshirt fabric. Top with a print motif and ears on the front, a press-stud on one shoulder and sewn-in turn-ups at the cuffs. Trousers with an elasticated drawstring waist.
T-shirts in soft organic cotton jersey with a round neck and straight-cut hem.
Tailored trousers in a stretch weave made from a cotton blend with a high waist with concealed elastication and a concealed zip at the top of one side seam. Fake back pockets and tapered legs.
Fully lined, print-patterned swimsuit with adjustable shoulder straps and a flounce at the top.
T-shirt in soft, printed cotton jersey.
Dungarees in cotton twill with adjustable straps. Chest pocket, front and back pockets, buttons at the sides and straight legs with seams at the knees.

5-pocket, ankle-length jeans in washed, sturdy cotton denim decorated with rhinestones. Slightly looser fit with an extra-high waist, button fly and straight legs. The cotton content of the jeans is partly recycled.
Jumper in a soft fine knit with dropped shoulders, long, wide puff sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Set with a T-shirt and shorts in soft, printed fabric. Jersey T-shirt with raw, roll edges around the neckline and sleeves and a chest pocket with a button. Shorts in sweatshirt fabric with covered elastication and a drawstring at the waist, side pockets and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Short sports shorts in fast-drying sweatshirt fabric with a wide covered elastic waistband, drawstring at the waist and diagonal side pockets.

Chinos in cotton twill with a zip fly and concealed hook-and-eye fastener, diagonal front pockets and jetted back pockets with a button. Regular Fit – a classic fit with good room for movement over the thighs and knees to create a comfortable, straight silhouette.

Sports trousers in stretch, fast-drying functional fabric with a regular, elasticated waist and internal drawstring. Zipped side pockets and straight legs with shaping seams at the knees and elasticated hems.
Top in soft, printed sweatshirt fabric with a lined hood, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Sleeveless dress in slub cotton jersey with a small opening and button at the back of the neck, frills at the top, a seam and a flared skirt.
Hair clip in metal with a large, voluminous bow in woven fabric made from recycled polyester. Size approx. 17x23 cm.
5-pocket jeans in washed stretch denim in a relaxed fit with an adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and button and tapered legs.
Thong briefs in lace and microfibre with a low waist, lined gusset and string back.
Long-sleeved jumper in soft, fine-knit cashmere with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Long-sleeved tops in lightweight cotton sweatshirt fabric, one with an all-over print. Ribbing around the neckline and cuffs and a straight-cut hem.
Shirt in soft, washed denim with a collar, press-studs down the front and yoke at the back. Flap chest pockets with a press-stud, long sleeves with a press-stud at the cuffs, and a rounded hem.
Fitted shirt in a stretch weave made from a cotton blend with a collar and concealed buttons down the front. Chest pocket, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a gently rounded hem.
Shorts in organic cotton jersey with an elasticated drawstring waist and side pockets.
Leggings in sturdy jersey with an elasticated waist and imitation suede patches on the inside of the legs.
